about_the_game:
Although I'm a girl, don't underestimate my shooting. The last pure land of mankind may depend on me to protect it. People call me "Doomsday Scavenger"......
Background
With the fall of the world, the living space of mankind was compressed to several islands. After years of operation, people finally connected several islands to form the doomsday community of mankind. Our heroine is a member of the guard army. She is responsible for cleaning up the fish in the street and some escort tasks every day.

Journal mode [/]
According to the content described in the diary, pick up the weapons in your hand and clean up the zombies on the road. A variety of zombie models can experience the pleasure of blood splashing and the stimulating head popping effect. The small map in the upper right corner can tell you the route and end point of this cleaning. With the advancement of diary content, the difficulty gradually increases. At present, there are five kinds of weapons, pistols, rifles, sniper rifles, rockets and grenades.

Free mode [/]
There is no bound map, all open, only one life. See how many zombies you can kill. After death, you will lose the weapons you have obtained and can only start again.

Tips

At present, it is a single player game, weak plot, only for shooting...
From point a to point B, clean up the zombies on the road and transfer automatically. Because it is only a game played by one person, the optimization is not ideal. It may take a little time to load the scene first, and it will be much better later. I hope you don't mind.

content_descriptors.notes: This is a third person zombie shooting game, which contains bloody violence with blood splashing, Part of the game includes nudity.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 Home Premium or better
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3570K or AMD FX-8310
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 1GB / AMD HD 4870 1GB (DX 10、10.1、11)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 500 GB available space
